header:
<js>
JSON.stringify({
  'User-Agent': "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 12; HarmonyOS; OCE-AN50; HMSCore 6.15.0.302) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/114.0.5735.196 HuaweiBrowser/16.0.1.301 Mobile Safari/537.36",
  'sec-ch-ua-platform': "\"Android\"",
  'origin': getUrl(),
  'x-requested-with': "cn.mujiankeji.mbrowser",
  'Referer': getUrl(),
  'Accept-Language': "zh-CN,zh;q=0.9,en-US;q=0.8,en;q=0.7"
})
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: .x-detail__info--author.0@text##作者：
ruleBookInfo.name: .x-detail__info--title.0@text

ruleContent.content:
<js>
if(result.match(/Just a moment.../)){
cookie.removeCookie(source.bookSourceUrl)
var s=java.startBrowserAwait(baseUrl,"验证").body();
result=s;
	}else{
		result=result;
		}
	result;
</js>
$..content[*]

ruleExplore.author: {{@@[class="x-book__info--author"]@textNodes}}{{@@[class="x-info__author"]@span.0@text}}
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
if(result.match(/Just a moment.../)){
cookie.removeCookie(source.bookSourceUrl)
var s=java.startBrowserAwait(baseUrl,"验证").body();
result=s;
	}else{
		result=result;
		}
	result;
</js>
.x-book
ruleExplore.name: p.0@text

ruleSearch.author: .book-status@text
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
//java.log(result)
if(result.match(/Tis/)){
	java.toast('❗\n请不要频繁刷新，请休息几秒再试吧❗')
}result;
</js>
.x-book
ruleSearch.name: p.0@text
